channel.title: Moved: [Release] Double Bladed Scythe [Release]
channel.description:
[size=20pt]Just to let u know this is my first model[/size] so if its bad try and help me improve it? :D
Here it is ;D
Pic on Datmaker. [IMG]http://img510.imageshack.us/img510/2702/seresdoublescythedatez4.png[/img]
This pic is in game/ inventory.
[IMG]http://img399.imageshack.us/img399/3879/seresdoublescytheqp2.png[/img]
So please post and tell me if u like it.
Download link:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mznzihnzkm0]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mznzihnzkm0[/url]
It's already gziped all u need to do is extract it and put it in your model folder.
and heres the class8 code: [code] if(i == 19655) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Weild";//New option class8.anInt174 = 12061; //Model ID // 20233 class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 12060;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 12060;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Double scythe";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A scythe made by Viper!".getBytes();//examin info } [/code]
You can change item id if u like. :D :D :D
edit: Fixed pics xD

item.title: Moved: [Release] Double Bladed Scythe [Release]
item.dc:creator: @death296 death296
item.description:
@death296 wrote:

[quote=“Doom32dd, post:7, topic:245880”]i need to learn to add models to another model, like that zammy whip :\

after i learn that and how to make drop models I WILL BE SOOO HAPPY

all i know how to do is make wield models XD[/quote]

While you are on Metasequoia hit ctrl+I then chose whatever model.

After that you click merge but move ur starting model so it wont merge right away.

Then you rotate, move, etc. the inserted model.

DROP MODEL:

… rotate it to face the ground? lol

Read full topic

item.title: Moved: [Release] Double Bladed Scythe [Release]
item.dc:creator: @vipercross vipercross
item.description:
@vipercross wrote:

[size=20pt]Just to let u know this is my first model[/size] so if its bad try and help me improve it?

Here it is ;D

Pic on Datmaker.

This pic is in game/ inventory.

So please post and tell me if u like it.

Download link:http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mznzihnzkm0

It’s already gziped all u need to do is extract it and put it in your model folder.

and heres the class8 code:

if(i == 19655) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Weild";//New option class8.anInt174 = 12061; //Model ID // 20233 class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 12060;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 12060;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Double scythe";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A scythe made by Viper!".getBytes();//examin info }

You can change item id if u like.

edit: Fixed pics xD
